entry.def: Bantu means belonging or relating to a group of peoples in central and southern Africa.

example.ex: ...a Bantu people who live on the southern slopes of the mountain.

entry.def: Bantu languages belong to a group of languages spoken in central and southern Africa.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of any of a large number of linguistically related peoples of Central and South Africa
2. a family of languages widely spoken in the southern half of the African continent
1. of or relating to the African people who speak one of the Bantoid languages or to their culture;
